extensionDescription.message: This add-on filters chat-messages from YouTube live streams. It either highlights chat-messages by displaying them in a separate chat-box, or deletes them.

settingsBoxSize.description: Size of the live-chat box setting.

enableOverlay.description: Settings: Option enable YouTube player overlay

btnOverlaySettings.description: Settings: Button open YouTube player overlay settings

filter1.description: Settings: Filter option one filter rule

filter2.description: Settings: Filter option two filter rules

highlight.description: Settings: Select option for highlighting messages

subtitles.description: Settings: Select option for YouTube player overlay

delete.description: Settings: Select option for deleting messages

startsWith.description: Settings: select option for matching string starting with

endsWith.description: Settings: select option for matching string ending with

includes.description: Settings: select option for matching string including

is.description: Settings: select option for matching string being the same as

regexp.description: Settings: select option for matching string Regular Expression

some.description: Settings: select option for matching some

every.description: Settings: select option for matching every

none.description: Settings: select option for matching none

and.description: Settings: select option for logical and

or.description: Settings: select option for logical or

not.description: Settings: select option for logical not

author.description: Settings: select option for author string

message.description: Settings: select option for message string

if.description: Settings: When of When string matches

filterAction.description: Settings: Name of column filter action

filterRule.description: Settings: Name of column filter rules

enableHighlight.description: Settings: Slider for enabling highlight chat-box

expertMode.description: Settings: Checkbox for enabling expert mode

evaluateFilter.description: Settings: Title of filter rule evaluation

noMatch.description: Settings: No Matchg of filter rule

placeholderRegexp.description: Settings: Placeholder for regular expression text input

placeholderStringArray.description: Settings: Placeholder for string array text input

titleFilterName.description: Settings: Title of filterName text box

titleSelectAction.description: Settings: Title of filter action select

titleSelectAuthor.message: Search within author name or chat-message

titleSelectArray.message: When more than one search-string is entered, this sets whether at least one, all or none should match it

titleTextSearchRegex.message: What to match. Enter one Regular Expression (see https://regexone.com/ for help)
titleTextSearchRegex.description: Settings: Title of search text when regex

titleTextSearchStrings.message: What to match. Enter one or more search-texts, separated by ";"
titleTextSearchStrings.description: Settings: Title of search text when strings

deleteFilterMessage.description: Settings: Confirmation message when deleting filter

titleSwitchEnableFilter.description: Settings: Title enable or disable filter

titleEnableOverlay.message: Enables player overlay for displaying YouTube live-chat messages as subtitles

titleBtnOverlaySettings.message: Opens window for setting subtitles style for the YouTube player
titleBtnOverlaySettings.description: Settings: Title button overlay style settings

titleEnableOverlayDuration.message: Shows subtitles for a set duration

titleSelectLanguage.message: Translator language of a YouTube live-chat message

titleExpertMode.message: Enables expert mode for using regular expressions for matching
titleExpertMode.description: Settings: Title of switch expert mode

titleAuthorEvaluation.message: Example author string of a YouTube live-chat message, for validating the filter rule

titleMessageEvaluation.message: Examle chat-message string of a YouTube live-chat message, for validating the filter rule

titleDoesMatch.message: Filter rule does match author and chat-message

titleNoMatch.message: Filter rule does not match author and chat-message
titleNoMatch.description: Settings: Title of no match string

titleEnableHighlightBox.message: Shows a chat-box below the YouTube chat-box where highlighted chat-messages are displayed
titleEnableHighlightBox.description: Settings: Title of switch highlight box

titleHighlightBoxSize.message: Size of the highlight chat-box in relation to YouTube chat-box in percent
titleHighlightBoxSize.description: Sittings: Title of highlight box size

menuSettingsPage.description: YouTube menu item for opening filter settings

menuHideHighlight.description: YouTube menu item for disabling highlight chat-box
